abstract: Bi-coastal Broadway actress Megan Hilty loves her Upper West Side rental apartment with floor-to-ceiling windows, which she shares with her husband and son, and where family's Christmas decorations are displayed year-round.

headline.print_headline: Where Comfort Reigns and Santa Is Handy
headline.main: Megan Hilty, Broadway Star, at Home

snippet: Ms. Hilty, a star of “Noises Off” on Broadway, lives on the Upper West Side with her husband, Brian Gallagher, an actor and musician.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Hilty, a star of “Noises Off” on Broadway, lives on the Upper West Side with her husband, Brian Gallagher, an actor and musician.
